name: The Museum
description:
It's your first day at the museum and your boss is sick. Someone needs to handle those tours - guess you'll have to improvise!

There are 6 exhibits in total and you're given 4 at random for each tour. If you want to see all of them you'll need to do multiple tours.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 36 based on the theme 'Ancient Technology'. Timelapse - LD entry page - PICO-8 forum thread

Feel free to tweet your favourite lines to @rhythm_lynx
Thanks for playing :)
